import React, { useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; import { gsap } from 'gsap'; import GridMotion from '../components/GridMotion'; const PavementSigns: React.FC = () => { const headingRef = useRef(null); const contentRef = useRef(null); const ctaRef = useRef(null); // Pavement signs images for GridMotion const pavementImages = Array.from({ length: 28 }, (_, index) => { const imageNum = (index % 4) + 1; return `/pavement-signs/pavement${imageNum}.jpg`; }); useEffect(() => { const tl = gsap.timeline({ defaults: { ease: 'power3.out' } }); tl.fromTo( headingRef.current, { opacity: 0, y: 60, scale: 0.9 }, { opacity: 1, y: 0, scale: 1, duration: 1.2, delay: 0.3 } ) .fromTo( contentRef.current, { opacity: 0, y: 40 }, { opacity: 1, y: 0, duration: 1 }, '-=0.7' ) .fromTo( ctaRef.current, { opacity: 0, y: 30 }, { opacity: 1, y: 0, duration: 0.9 }, '-=0.5' ); }, []); const features = [ { title: 'A-Board Classics', description: 'Traditional wooden and metal A-boards with chalk or printed panels', icon: 'ðŸ“‹' }, { title: 'Swing Signs', description: 'Double-sided swing signs with weather-resistant graphics', icon: 'âš¡' }, { title: 'Poster Holders', description: 'Sleek aluminum frames with quick-change poster systems', icon: 'ðŸŽ¯' }, { title: 'Custom Shapes', description: 'Bespoke die-cut designs that stand out from the crowd', icon: 'âœ¨' } ]; return (
